casebody.data:
69 Sup Court 1822 Edward R. Campbell vs. Stephen Mack. Filed in open Court Septr 23d 1824.

J. Kearsley.

Clerk.

SUPREME COURT, MICH TERRY

Edward R. Campbell vs. Stephen Mack

Principal $905.20

Interest thereon from August nth 1821, which is for 3 yrs. 1 month and 11 days 169.12

$1074.32

I have examined the matter referred and do certify & report the above sum (to wit one thousand and seventy four Dollars & thirty two cents) due & owing to Edward R. Campbell by Stephen Mack and as such respectfully submit this report in obedience to the order of this Court.

Sept1 22d 1824.

J. Kearsley.

Clerk

*706[Indorsement]

This Report is accepted by the Attornies of the parties

A G Whitney

PlfFs Atty

WOODBRIDGE

Deft’s Atty
